items.title: Vinicius Jr apologises to Real Madrid fans
items.description: Real Madrid winger Vinicius Jr apologises to supporters for his reaction to being substituted in Sunday's fiery El Clasico win against Barcelona.

items.title: Asylum seeker who murdered man inside bank jailed
items.description: Haybe Cabdiraxmaan Nur is jailed for life for the murder of 37-year-old Gurvinder Johal.

items.title: Neighbours with baseball bats 'saved life' of man attacked in London triple stabbing
items.description: Uxbridge residents ran out with baseball bats to protect one of the men attacked on Monday.

items.title: Jamaicans wake to devastation - floods, power cuts and crippled communications
items.description: With communication networks in Jamaica crippled, the true scale of the disaster remains unknown.

items.title: Mistakes not 'Crashgate' cost Massa title, court hears
items.description: Former Ferrari driver Felipe Massa is seeking Â£64m in damages over the 2008 drivers' championship, which was won by Lewis Hamilton.
